Module com.alike
Package com.alike.solvers

Class HilbertFractalCurveSolver

java.lang.Object
com.alike.solvers.HilbertFractalCurveSolver
public class HilbertFractalCurveSolver extends Object
Class constructs hilbert fractal curves and then uses the path to solve a TSPGraph route.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static int
    order
    The order of Hilbert curve to construct (how many iterations to do).
    final int
    total
    The total number of points that will be drawn.

  • Constructor Details

    • HilbertFractalCurveSolver

      public HilbertFractalCurveSolver(TSPGraph graph) throws NonSquareCanvasException
      Used to construct a new @code{HilbertFractalCurveSolver} object.
      Parameters:
      graph - The graph which we are solving.
      Throws:
      NonSquareCanvasException - Thrown if the canvas is not a square and of side length a power of two.

  • Method Details

    • runSolution

      public javafx.util.Pair<TSPGraph,Double> runSolution(int delayPerStep) throws EdgeSuperimpositionException, NodeMissedException, InterruptedException, NonSquareCanvasException, FractalDensityException
      Used to instruct @code{this} to find a route around the @code{graph} attribute.
      Parameters:
      delayPerStep - Time to wait between adding edges to the graphs edge container (so we can see it drawn).
      Returns:
      A pair containing the value of the @code{graph} attribute and a double - the length of its route.
      Throws:
      EdgeSuperimpositionException - Thrown if an attempt is made to make an edge that already exists.
      NodeMissedException - Thrown if a node is missed by the fractal path we used.
      InterruptedException - Thrown if the thread is interrupted.
      NonSquareCanvasException - Thrown if the canvas is not square (needed because we are calling the constructor again).
      FractalDensityException

    • constructRoute

      public void constructRoute(int delayPerStep) throws EdgeSuperimpositionException, NodeMissedException, InterruptedException, EdgeToSelfException
      Constructs an edge container for the @code{graph} using the list output by @code{getNodesOrdered}.
      Parameters:
      delayPerStep - The time wait after each edge addition (so we can see it draw if we want).
      Throws:
      EdgeSuperimpositionException - Thrown if an attempt is made to create an edge that already exists.
      NodeMissedException - Thrown if a node is missed using the current hilbert curve as the map.
      InterruptedException - Thrown if the thread is interrupted.
      EdgeToSelfException

    • getNodesOrdered

      public ArrayList<TSPNode> getNodesOrdered() throws NodeMissedException
      Returns the nodes in an order using the current hilbert curve to map the nodes into an order.
      Returns:
      Throws:
      NodeMissedException

      public void setGraph(TSPGraph graph)
      Sets the @code{graph} attribute to a new value.
      Parameters:
      graph - The new value to become the @code{graph} attribute.

      public ArrayList<Coordinate> getCornerCoordinates()
      Returns the value of the @code{cornerCoordinates} attribute.
